title: sacaamara
sahitya:
sacAmara ramAvANI savya dakSiNa sEvitE





anupallavi



 sacIndaranutE shakti dEvisa carAcara jagadrUpiNi



caraNam

 sakala brahmANDa sAmrAjyasu vaibhavE sukha vi vAgvibhava sangIta rasAnubhAvE sukhAdi

 bhakta jana sukha dAyaka surucira bhAvE sukha sudAmbudhi harikEsha sukhadAyini salahau
